summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the end‑to‑end functionality of the migration executor, checking its handling of various migration scenarios, atomicity, callbacks, soft‑apply mode, replacement marks, foreign‑key alterations, squashed migrations, and interactions with unrelated migrations and model lookups.
business_intent: Guarantee that the migration executor reliably applies migration plans, respects atomic and non‑atomic boundaries, executes callbacks, correctly records replacement marks, supports soft application, and maintains consistent state across diverse migration configurations.
